amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy (ARPA-E) by $20 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Advanced Research Projects Agency-Energy (ARPA-E) by $20 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 219 (Roll no. 202).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 219 (Roll no. 202).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA).
